metadata.title: CVE-2022-23806 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Curve.IsOnCurve in crypto/elliptic in Go before 1.16.14 and 1.17.x before 1.17.7 can incorrectly return true in situations with a big.Int value that is not a valid field element.

notes.note: jdstrand> snapd contains an embedded copy of golang-go.crypto lxd in 18.04 LTS and earlier contains an embedded copy of golang-go.crypto

criterions.comment: golang-go.crypto package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
snapd package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
